backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a homepage layout change to HomePage.tsx with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML wrapper mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and authentication gating via AppShell.
frontend/src/components/explore/Category: Renders clickable category filter chips using UI state selection.
frontend/src/components/explore/ExploreG: Displays a responsive grid of explore tiles with hover overlays and like counts.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Post card UI with like, comment, share actions and a comments dialog.
Scrollable stories row with modal story viewer.
Authenticated layout wrapper combining sidebar, top bar, and content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Navigation sidebar with primary links and a scrollable community list.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopBar.ts: Top navigation bar with search, notifications, messages, and user dropdown, using UI state and custom hooks.
frontend/src/components/suggestions/Sugg: Shows a list of suggested users with follow toggling and a link to view more.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnEscape.ts: Runs a callback when the Escape key is pressed.
frontend/src/hooks/useOutsideClick.ts: Triggers a callback when a click occurs outside the referenced element.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining CSS variables, themes, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/mock/mockData.ts: Defines mock user, post, community, story, and explore tile data for frontend usage.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Displays a community's details and recent posts based on route params using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePage.tsx: Image upload form allowing users to preview artwork and enter caption and tags before publishing or saving as draft.
frontend/src/pages/ExplorePage.tsx: Filters and displays explore tiles based on selected category and search query using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/ForgotPasswordPage.ts: Email-based password reset flow with submit confirmation and navigation back to login.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays stories and posts filtered by search query along with suggested users.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: User login form with validation, mock authentication, and optional navigation to password reset.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows user profile details with posts grid, saved tab, and profile editing entry point.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Signup form with basic validation and mock authentication before redirecting home.
frontend/src/state/storage.ts: LocalStorage wrapper providing get, set, and remove methods with JSON handling and error safety.
frontend/src/state/useMockAuth.ts: Zustand store implementing a simple persistent mock authentication system with login and logout.
frontend/src/state/useUiState.ts: Zustand store managing followed users, liked posts, explore category, and search query with persistence using localStorage and Set merging.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, plugins, custom colors, radii, shadows, and animations with extended theme tokens.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Artlink frontend-only app, its features, architectural notes, and known issues.
